topic.title: Migrating apps from VO to X#

header.para: Migrating apps from VO to X#

body.para: In this topic, we will discuss how to migrate applications from Visual Objects (VO) to X#, using the VO XPorter tool from X#.

When you want to do this, we strongly recommend you to start small. Therefore, we will start with a few VO example programs and describe the steps to take and the necessary adjustments after the conversion.
The examples on the following pages provide a step-by-step introduction to migrating your apps.
Each example is included with the X# installer and comes with separate "before" and "after" folders to illustrate the changes made during the migration process.
